data.eml:eml: The first Aleyrodidae from the Lowermost Eocene Oise amber (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Drohojowska, Jowita, Szwedo, Jacek (2013): The first Aleyrodidae from the Lowermost Eocene Oise amber (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha). Zootaxa 3636 (2): 319-347, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.2.5
